query: The attached spreadsheet lists the locomotives owned by a local railroad museum. What is the typical American name for the type of locomotive this museum uses for the Murder Mystery Express?

tasks.description: Обработать прикрепленную таблицу, чтобы получить информацию о локомотивах, принадлежащих музею.

tasks.description: Извлечь типы локомотивов из обработанной таблицы.

key_points: Various types of locomotives are listed with their configurations and operational statuses.

tasks.description: Найти информацию о типах локомотивов, используемых для Murder Mystery Express.

result.query: Найти информацию о типах локомотивов, используемых для Murder Mystery Express.

facts.fact: Western Maryland Scenic Railroad reserves the right to change equipment, including locomotives, at any time due to mechanical and safety needs.
The Murder Mystery Express is part of the Western Maryland Scenic Railroad's offerings.
Tickets for the Mystery Express event at the National Railroad Museum will go on sale on December 29, 2025.

sources.title: Murder Mystery Train Rides in Maryland
sources.snippet:
Western Maryland Scenic Railroad makes every effort to maintain its schedule. Due to mechanical and Safety Needs, we reserve the right to change equipment, locomotive, and passenger cars at any time.

Please review our full cancellation policies and terms here.

Book Now

Our Other Excursions

 ## Frostburg Flyer

  Our signature service showcases the very best of Mountain Maryland, taking you on a breathtaking journey between Cumberland and Frostburg.

  Book Today
 ## Ice Cream Trains

  Cool off this summer with one of our delightful Ice Cream Train rides, departing from Cumberland Station.

sources.title: Mystery Express - National Railroad Museum
sources.snippet: This event will take place on Saturday and Sunday, March 21-22, 2026. Tickets will go on sale on December 29, 2025. Tickets are $40 each and must be purchased

sources.snippet:
> Например ,стали рассказывать ,что впрошлом году вМоскве был такой случай .Кдоктору
> Снегиреву пришла какая -то девочка врозовом платье иговорит ,что уней больная мать и
> чтобы доктор пришел кее матери .Оставила адрес иушла .Только она ушла ,как доктор
> захотел расспросить ее подробней оболезни ,чтобы знать ,что из лекарств ссобой захватить .
> Вот доктор зовет горничную ивелит ей воротить девочку .Горничная говорит ,что никакой
> девочки она не видела .Тогда доктор зовет швейцара снизу лестницы ,но швейцар тоже
> говорит ,что девочки не видал .Доктор ,вне себя от удивления ,едет по оставл

result.summary: The Murder Mystery Express utilizes locomotives from the Western Maryland Scenic Railroad, which may change for safety and mechanical reasons. Tickets for related events are scheduled for future sales.

tasks.description: Построить логический вывод о типичном американском названии локомотива, используемого для Murder Mystery Express.

assumptions: The Murder Mystery Express is operated by the Western Maryland Scenic Railroad.
Locomotives used for the Murder Mystery Express may vary due to mechanical and safety needs.
reasoning_steps: Identify the types of locomotives listed in the provided document.
Note that the locomotive with the designation '266' (2-8-4) is specifically mentioned as operational for the Murder Mystery Express.
Consider the context of typical American locomotive naming conventions and configurations.
conclusions: The typical American locomotive name for the Murder Mystery Express is likely to be '266', which is a 2-8-4 configuration.
proposed_answer_outline: The Murder Mystery Express utilizes a locomotive with the designation '266', which is a 2-8-4 type.
This naming convention is consistent with typical American locomotive classifications.

tasks.description: Написать финальный ответ пользователю о типичном американском названии локомотива.
